A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"The Last Jedi\" is one of the best Star Wars films yet. I loved the twists and turns and how it frequently worked against expectations\, which is a great thing. It was 2 1/2 hours of pure entertainment. I've been a Star Wars fan since watching the original in a theater when I was turning 12 in 1977\, and \"The Last Jedi\" thrilled me. I can't wait until the third part of this trilogy.
